element.definition: A code that identifies a particular procedure, diagnostic investigation, or panel of investigations, that have been requested.
element.comment: Many laboratory and radiology procedure codes embed the specimen/organ system in the test ordeer name, for example,  serum or serum/plasma glucose, or a chest xray. The specimen may not be recorded separately from the test code.

binding.description: Codes for tests/services that can be performed by procedure or diagnostic services.  For laboratory, LOINC is  (preferred)[http://build.fhir.org/terminologies.html#preferred] and a valueset using LOINC Order codes is available [here](valueset-diagnostic-requests.html).
